themes.name: Memory System Architecture
themes.description: Comparison of biological vs computational memory models
supporting_quotes: Human memory is associative, not indexed
Computer memory is linear and addressable

themes.name: Temporal Knowledge Dynamics
themes.description: Time as constitutive element of knowledge formation
supporting_quotes: Time shapes knowledge, not just stores it

summary: The dataset reveals two primary themes: contrasting memory architectures between biological and digital systems, and the temporal nature of knowledge formation.
